source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Model complex 3D architectural geometry with Rhinoceros
items.headline: Learn to model freeform 3D with straight-forward example projects from real buildings, ready to apply in other projects
objectives_summary: creating complex 3D shapes and geometry, to model freeform, organic architecture
break down a seemingly difficult shape into a logical sequence of geometric operations
control the smoothness and continuity of the geometry with visual feedback from Rhinoceros

items.title: Intermediate Game Asset Creation - 3D Modeling in Blender

visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Modeler, FX Artist, and Game Developer
visible_instructors.title: Timothy Trankle
visible_instructors.name: Timothy

items.headline: Learn intermediate 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering with Blender and 3D-Coat by creating AAA ready game assets
objectives_summary: Use 3D modeling in Blender to create a practical, real world game asset that you can use in your own creations or expand upon into other game assets.
Make awesome, AAA game assets by utilizing just the right tools and techniques of the software that you need.
Save time and money by creating your own 3D models, quickly and efficiently.

items.title: Maya 2018 VFX - Learn to create Visual effects using Maya
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of VFX by creating a realistic model and composite it into background footage using Nuke
objectives_summary: Learn the VFX pipleline for a shot
Matchmove or track a cameras motion in Matchmover
Basic hard surface modeling

items.title: 2D Character Animation: Walk Cycles
items.headline: Design Characters for animation in Adobe Animate : animate a character step by step : animate a full scene
objectives_summary: You will learn the Animation Principles
You'll learn how to make awesome Character Designs for Animation
You'll learn how to animate a character in Adobe Animate

items.title: 3D Animation Film-Making with Plotagon (2021 Edition)

visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Marketing Legend: King of AI - 7,50,000+ Students
visible_instructors.title: Srinidhi Ranganathan
visible_instructors.name: Srinidhi

items.headline: MBA in Creative Arts, Design and Animation: Level 3 - Part 1 course focussing on 3D Animation Movie-Making Tool Plotagon
objectives_summary: Create stunning 3D animation movies at incredible speed in 2021.
Know about great other screen-casting platforms for video editing.
Know about a new facial mocap platform for 3D animation creation

items.title: Create an Animated Character in Blender 2.9
items.headline: Learn to create an animated character in Blender using only open-source software.
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling in Blender
UV Mapping
Texturing in Krita and Blender

items.title: Mastering 3D Modeling With Blender For Beginners
items.headline: The most comprehensive online 3D modeling course taking you from complete beginner to PRO
objectives_summary: Mastering the modeling tools of Blender 2.8
Learn 3D modeling skills and techniques
Get hands-on experience and practice with a number of exercises

items.title: Learn and Master Computer-Aided Design (CAD) With Tinkercad
items.headline: Use 100% free software to create custom 3D objects that can be used for 3D printing, videogames, and animated movies.
objectives_summary: Create custom 3D models for use with games, movies, and 3D printing.
Add basic (primitive) shapes such as spheres and boxes to the workspace.
Merge basic shapes to create more complex shapes.

items.title: Scene Creation with Blender and Substance Painter
items.headline: Use Blender and Substance Painter to create an interior scene for animation, games, or architectural visualization.
objectives_summary: Blender's modeling tools and modifiers
UV map 3D objects in Blender
Prepare 3D models for export to Substance Painter

items.headline: A comprehensive guide to compositing for live-action films in post-production visual effects using Adobe After Effects.
objectives_summary: Know what, when and how to do simple to advanced compositing in Adobe After Effects
Know how to use Adobe After Effects for simple to advanced compositing of live-action shots
Apply basic and high-level techniques in compositing

Know how to use After Effects and Mocha AE for rotoscoping live-action shots
Apply basic and advanced techniques in rotoscoping

Create and manipulate bone objects.

Recognize the importance of BIM,
Define common BIM terms
